Package application

Class Database

java.lang.Object
application.Database
public class Database extends Object
public class to for methods to edit database.

      Parameters:

      amount - number of orders that we need to load
      Returns:

      Parameters:
      startDate - date in sql format "yyyy-MM-dd"
      endDate - date in sql format "yyyy-MM-dd"
      itemId - id of the item we are counting sales for
      Returns:
      Map of string of date and Integer of number of items sold

      Parameters:
      numPairs - - how many pairs do you want to return
      Returns:
      - list of pairs and how often they occur

    • getExcessReport

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Object>> getExcessReport(String time, String endTime)
      returns items that sold less than 10% of their inventory
      Parameters:
      time - timestamp in sql format "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS"
      Returns:
      Map of Integer of id, String of name, Integer of amount sold, and Integer of total inventory

    • getRestockReport

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Object>> getRestockReport()
      returns items whose inventory is less than the minimum requirement
      Returns:
      Map of Integer of item IDs, String of common names, and Integer of Current Stock
